description: Optional hook to remind about task completion when tests pass
usage: Add this to your .claude/settings.json under the 'hooks' key

hooks.command: jq -r 'if (.tool_input.command | contains("pytest") or contains("go test") or contains("npm test") or contains("make test")) and (.exit_code == 0) then "\n⚠️  All tests passed! Consider completing the task with: /task-complete <task-id>\n" else "" end'
